pipette module¶

class pipette.Pipette(axis)[source]¶

Bases: tool.Tool

Representation of a pipette on the robot head

Class for holding a pipette’s calibrated values, and includes functions for mapping locations and such. Each pipette instance is created inside the head object, and is either motor axis ‘a’ or ‘b’

Calibrated values include:
Plunger locations(top, bottom, blowout, droptip) Container coordinates (XYZ coordinate of each container’s origin)
Todo:

calibrate(property_, value)[source]¶

Set a given pipette property to a value

calibrate_container(containerName, coords)[source]¶

Set the absolute location coordinates of a given container for this pipette

create_deck(containerNameArray)[source]¶

Generate a list of containers represented on deck for the pipette given a list of containers

end_sequence()[source]¶

Returns the end pipetting sequence when running pipette command - currently an empty dictionary

init_sequence()[source]¶

Returns the initial pipetting sequence when running pipette command - returns plunger to resting position

pmap(loc)[source]¶

Translates relative coordinates from instructions into absolute coordinates, either for a pipette plunger operation, or a pipette head move to container operation

Example loc:
loc = {
x:number, y:number, z:number, container:string,//// plunger:float ||’blowout’ || ‘droptip’ || ‘resting’ speed: integer ms (add label for this pipettes axis)

}

rel_to_abs(rel_val)[source]¶

Convert a relative value between top and bottom to an absolute position for a pipette plunger operation

relative_coords()[source]¶
